FAQ.q1: How do I enable the App Embed?
FAQ.1.0: Go to Shopify admin → Online Store → Customize
FAQ.1.3: Click Save to make it live
FAQ.1.4: Optional: Clear cache if changes don’t appear
FAQ.1.5: Ensure your theme supports app embeds
FAQ.q2: My offer isn’t showing up — what should I do?
FAQ.2.1: Check if the app embed is enabled
FAQ.2.6: Offers may take a few minutes to appear.
FAQ.q3: How do I reposition the widget?
FAQ.3.1: Use theme editor to drag the widget
FAQ.3.4: Ensure widget doesn’t overlap other elements
FAQ.q5: Can I use the app with PageFly?
FAQ.5.1: Yes, it works with PageFly, GemPages, and Shogun.
FAQ.5.2: Enable app embed in Shopify admin
FAQ.5.3: Add widget block in PageFly editor
FAQ.q6: How do I troubleshoot widget issues?
FAQ.6.1: Check if app embed is enabled

Ext.extensionStatusDescription: This shows which blocks are active on which pages.
